lines.text: An investigation of the relationship between literacy, identity, and pop culture through first graders.
lines.text_raw: An investigation of the relationship between literacy, identity, and pop culture through first graders.

lines.text: I love music, it speaks to me. Break-up songs, love songs, work-out music, songs that help mellow me out, songs that help me praise, and songs that are nostalgic each speak to me in a special way. While I always have some sort of music playing at work or at home, very rarely and I mean like, never, is it hip-hop music.  This genre of music; however, is one that my first grade students listen to often and they lit up when we began discussing their favorite artists. At the top of the list is Willow Smith and hands down, the class favorite song is “Whip My Hair.”
